body.p: Born in Madison, Jefferson County, Indiana May 17, 1939. He attended Hanover College from 1856 – 1858 to practice law. He attended Kentucky Military Institute in 1860. Organized Gray’s. Group Eventually formed into the sixth Regiment Indiana Volunteers, under George B. McClellan. He was them promoted to Major and assigned to the Nineteenth Indiana Infantry. He eventually became a Lieutenant Colonel and commanded the Nineteenth Indiana Infantry Regiment as a part of the Army of the Potomac. He was killed at the battle of Antietam on September 17, 1862.
